subject: Advance planning for levy fees (Toll) on sections/newly constructed bridges/bypasses under Public Funded projects : Revision of Index Rate of Fee
text: HRv 7rrf1 Trf yfaazot QM9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma 4aa3, 73+ 4acTt 31< TTrhTT HATT} #T ( Fax '9t-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QA Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 3h5 T 6, 04r-10, ERGT, 7f Rvrm-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-1O, Dwarka Delhi-110075 NHAI 13013/124/04-05/CMD-CO/WPI 17 June 2005 By email/ Courier Circular No: NHAI/ COMMERCIAL OPERATION/60 Sub: Advance Planning for Levy of Fees (Toll) on Sections newly constructed bridges bypasses under Public Funded projects; Revision 0f Index Rate of Fee This is in continuation to our circular no. NHAI / Commercial Operation/42 dated 21.06.2004. In view of the Wholesale Price Index (WPI) for 2004-2005 made available by the office of Economic Advisor; Ministry of Commerce and Industry, Govt of India vide their letter dated 14.06.2005 (copy   enclosed), henceforth all notifications for of user fee under public funded_proiects shall be submitted using following indexed rate till the next &nnual index is available. Indexed _atefor Project involving_conversion from 2 lane to 4 lane_considering_WPL for 2004-05 Type of Vehicle Base Capping Rate Indexed Rate (Per Km) (Per Km) Car / Jeep/Van 0.40 0.570 LCV 0.70 0.998 Truck Bus 1.40 1.996 HCM/EME 3.00 4.276 1) Base capping rate are based on June 1997 wholesale price index {base 1993-94: 10O) Z:lmmlohiaineelamladvance plemning citcular doc #1 % % A NHAL New levy year
